load_hg hyperedges-contact-primary-school.txt node-labels-contact-primary-school.txt
load_pattern pattern_edges.txt pattern_node_labels.txt
match
add_vertex 1
add_vertex 2
add_vertex 3
set_vertex_label 242 2
set_vertex_label 243 3
set_vertex_label 244 1
delete_vertex 242
add_vertex 1
set_vertex_label 245 2
match
quit
